title: Slow Cooker Barbecued Pork Chop Supper Recipe
directions: Place potatoes and carrots in a 5-qt. slow cooker. Top with pork chops. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In a small bowl, combine the barbecue sauce, ketchup, cola and Worcestershire sauce; pour over chops.
Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours or until meat and vegetables are tender. Yield: 8 servings.
ingredients: 6 small red potatoes, cut into quarters
8 bone-in pork loin or rib chops (1/2 inch thick and 8 ounces each)
